virtual FDO_API bool FdoIDataStoreReader::GetIsFdoEnabled (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Gets the flag that indicates whether the datastore is FDO enabled. Non-FDO databases are also referred to as foreign datastores.

Returns:
Returns the flag
